comments.content:
My guess is that this error has to do with cinder API. The reason being that validity checking for name fields was introduced to nova API with this change: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/67781/ and that commit is included in the kilo release. I certainly cannot create an image with name longer than 256 characters from an instance launched on local storage, it fails with a BadRequest response, similar to @Liyingjun's example.

@Ahmad Faheem: I am correct in assuming that you are launching the instance on network storage managed by cinder? If that is the case, could you try the same steps with an instance launched on local storage?
